resources.string: Name and Address of School Campus Borrowing Office

I hereby authorize the School Campus Borrowing Office to verify my current enrollment status, financial need, and any other relevant information necessary to process my request for borrowing devices. I further authorize the Borrowing Office to gather information regarding my academic performance and any relevant references. It is understood that a copy of this authorization will be kept on file.\n\nThe information obtained by the Borrowing Office is solely for the purpose of assessing my eligibility for borrowing devices from the school campus.
